Author: sugarysweet24
Text: I’m going through the same thing! drinking cold brewed tea (I make the fake depression version and just pour almost frozen water over a tea bag LOL) generally helps me w nausea, feeling stuffed, etc. Gas-x helps a ton w the cramping and gas pains. Beyond that keep at it!! I’ve been feeling like death the first two weeks of this but I’ve pushed through and the stomach pains haven’t been so bad today :-) good luck, hope you feel better soon!

Author: ak528015
Text: this happens to me as well.   although, i’ve noticed that it really depends on what i eat after a period of not eating/not eating much. usually eating a lighter food (salad, fruit, veggies, nuts) first, and then something else reduces the feelings.   i’ll get extremely nauseous and stomach cramps if i jump straight from eating nothing to eating something heavy (chipotle, foods high in fat, pasta, etc).
